If 15.2 is not released to the public yet, how did you come by this?

Hiren releases to a few folks [not sure exactly how many] on an Email list that has link(s) to "cyber locker" sites. After I download it, I share it via Bittorrent here at TPB. But, there are others who get it using a search engine like Google. You will find other site that have direct download links.
Hi, may I know where I can download complete program for this? It seem some of them are missing which is paid one, so hope somebody can create a complete HBCD :)

@TheEmpathicEar

Yeah I means commercial software, hope somebody have complete commercial software in latest HBCD and share with us :)

@adrianyujs

They will. As I pointed out, it is called Hiren's Boot DVD "Restored". After a new version of Hiren's is released, someone uses it as a starting point and creates this version that contains the commercial software and more. It is usually uploaded at [h][3][3][t] and possibly here at TPB.
